text: Belleville is a city in the southeastern part of Ontario, Canada. It is the seat of Hastings County. About 55,071 people were living in Belleville as of the year 2021. == Media == CJBQ 800 CIJL 97.1 == Sister cities == * Lahr, Germany * Kunpow, South Korea * Zhucheng, People's Republic of China == Other websites == * City of Belleville website == References == Category:Cities in Ontario
title: Belleville, Ontario
